column1: Uchi////What I found to be bizarre
column2: I had a fish dish and a meat dish
column3: but in sushi roll form.  Both dishes had an undertone of being smoked or earthy in flavor.   Almost like everything that comes out of that kitchen is going to have a smoked flavor one way or another.  I found that a bit disconcerting.  Yes
column4: it's Texas and it's all about Steak
column6: BBQ's etc.... but I don't expect my sushi to taste like that.  Strange.
